Description: [b]Additional Setup:[/b] Remove 4 copies of Overexertion from the game. Shuffle the remaining 3 copies of Overexertion into your deck. For the duration of this scenario, ignore the text on Kepral's Syndrome and the  "Return this card to the Overexertion deck instead of discarding it" text on each copy of Overexertion.
Name: Notecard
Nickname: [b]Thane Krios - The City of Archives Setup Changes[/b]
